text:
If I have a file "/dirs/files/PCTdefs.xml" containing external references:

<!DOCTYPE ni PUBLIC "NI definition"  "http://dtds.cellectivity.com/ni.dtd"
[<!ENTITY identities SYSTEM 'com.cellectivity.PCTIdentities.xml'>
<!ENTITY defaultformat SYSTEM 'com.cellectivity.PCTDefaultFormat.xml'>]>
<name-identities>
&identities;
&defaultformat;
</name-identities>

When I parse this file using my own EntityResolver I get the following 
systemIds:
   'http://dtds.cellectivity.com/ni.dtd'
   'com.cellectivity.PCTIdentities.xml'
   'com.cellectivity.PCTDefaultFormat.xml'

instead, if I understand the spec correctly I should be getting:
   'http://dtds.cellectivity.com/ni.dtd'
   'file:///dirs/files/com.cellectivity.PCTIdentities.xml'
   'file:///dirs/files/com.cellectivity.PCTDefaultFormat.xml'

otherwise there is no way for a resolver to take into account the relative 
location of files.
